Another PR related to #90317 (ordering): https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/94006

I was so eager to clear away sorting of HirIds that I didn't fully think through whether the type introduced here would have the same problems. :grimacing: Is rustc_middle::mir::Field safe for incr. comp. in the sense of #90317?

Field represents the position of a data field inside an datatype. This type exists for documentation and type-safety purposes.
It derives HashStable in a straightforward manner: the index is hashed, without any elaborate hashing scheme like DefId and ExpnId do. So Fieldis fine for incr comp.
Oh thank goodness! :relieved:
